intro: Theaphylla laxa, commonly known as the silky daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its soft, silvery foliage and showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and thrives in full sun. Its compact growth habit makes it suitable for rock gardens and containers. Theaphylla laxa is known for its drought tolerance and low maintenance requirements.
